    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking box-destaque-assunto "><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/cavs-encaram-ma-fase-e-os-spurs-para-manter-ponta-na-conferencia-leste.html"

<div class="gui-newsfeed-list">
    
    
        
            

<div class="gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper-with-thumb"  data-isoformat="2017-03-27T17:03:43-03:00" >
    <div class="gui-image-hover">
        
            <a class="gui-newsfeed-item-thumb" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/apos-semana-na-d-league-splitter-e-chamado-pelos-sixers-de-volta-nba.html" title="Após semana na D-League, Splitter é chamado pelos Sixers de volta à NBA" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/eoG24AKcJ57pM0KEV1vR8WXBOUY=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/22/23147747.jpg">
                
                    <figure class="gui-image-full">

        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    8:00 - 26/03/2017
                
            </p>
        

        <div class="share-bar plantao-share" data-theme="minimal" data-url="https://glo.bo/2mDuA6J" data-title="Harden x Westbrook: último confronto direto na disputa pelo prêmio de MVP" data-image-url="http://s2.glbimg.com/Nkxp1bw29YRoMGzQtk8A9BkUXCs=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/01/19/gettyimages-632021408.jpg"></div>
    </div>
</div>

        

        
    
        
            

<div class="gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper-with-thumb"  data-isoformat="2017-03-25T23:07:36-03:00" >
    <div class="gui-image-hover">
        
            <a class="gui-newsfeed-item-thumb" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/lebron-joga-oculos-longe-perde-para-os-wizards-e-ve-ameca-ao-seu-trono.html" title="LeBron joga óculos longe, perde para os Wizards, e vê ameaça ao seu trono" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/Ajq6V893l2Z39y0mUeuSj6YIzHI=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/25/2017-03-26t004252z_436146117_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-washington-wizards-at-cleveland-cavaliers_EWprVgi.jpg">
                
                    <figure class="gui-image-full">
                        <img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/Ajq6V893l2Z39y0mUeuSj6YIzHI=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/25/2017-03-26t004252z_436146117_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-washington-wizards-at-cleveland-cavaliers_EWprVgi.jpg" alt="LeBron joga óculos longe, perde para os Wizards, e vê ameaça ao seu trono">
                    </figure>
                
            </a>
        

        
            
                <p class="gui-text-headline"><strongnba</strong></p>
            
        

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/lebron-joga-oculos-longe-perde-para-os-wizards-e-ve-ameca-ao-seu-trono.html" title="LeBron joga óculos longe, perde para os Wizards, e vê ameaça ao seu trono" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title" data-href="https://glo.bo/2n5QrQr" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/Ajq6V893l2Z39y0mUeuSj6YIzHI=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/25/2017-03-26t004252z_436146117_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-washington-wizards-at-cleveland-cavaliers_EWprVgi.jpg">
            <h3 class="gui-text-title ">LeBron joga óculos longe, perde para os Wizards, e vê ameaça ao seu trono</h3>
        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    23:07 - 25/03/2017
                
            </p>
        

        <div class="share-bar plantao-share" data-theme="minimal" data-url="https://glo.bo/2n5QrQr" data-title="LeBron joga óculos longe, perde para os Wizards, e vê ameaça ao seu trono" data-image-url="http://s2.glbimg.com/Ajq6V893l2Z39y0mUeuSj6YIzHI=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/25/2017-03-26t004252z_436146117_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-washington-wizards-at-cleveland-cavaliers_EWprVgi.jpg"></div>
    </div>
</div>

var SVCPesquisaConfig = {};
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

                <span class="header__assinatura__txt">
                    
                </span>
                
                    




    

    
        
            
	


    
	
    

    <a class="header__assinatura__link" title="ASSINE JÁ" href="https://www.assineglobo.com.br/produtos/gq/GQ/?site_par=1&amp;origem_par=1&amp;formato_par=GQ_MENSAL&amp;versao_par=CAPA&amp;utm_source=capa&amp;utm_medium=site&amp;utm_campaign=gq_mensal&amp;utm_content=capa:site:gq_mensal:capa&amp;utm_term=capa">

        <strong class="header__assinatura__helper">ASSINE JÁ</strong>
    </a>






        
    


                
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <a class="header__assinatura__link" title="ASSINE JÁ" href="https://www.assineglobo.com.br/produtos/gq/GQ/?site_par=1&amp;origem_par=1&amp;formato_par=GQ_MENSAL&amp;versao_par=CAPA&amp;utm_source=capa&amp;utm_medium=site&amp;utm_campaign=gq_mensal&amp;utm_content=capa:site:gq_mensal:capa&amp;utm_term=capa">

</header>
<script type="text/javascript">
        var MenuSelect = {

            initialize : function(itemSelected) {
                jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                    var self = MenuSelect;
                    self._selectItemFromPageSection(itemSelected);
                });
            },
            
            _selectItemFromPageSection : function(item) {

                jQuery.each(jQuery(".main-nav__link"), function(index,obj) {

                    documentObjectModelAnchors = jQuery(obj);
                    var anchorText = documentObjectModelAnchors[0].innerHTML;
                    descricao = anchorText.toUpperCase();

                    descricao = descricao.replace("&", "E");
                    descricao = descricao.replace(/\s{1,}/g, '');
                    item = item.toUpperCase();


                    console.log(item);
                    console.log(descricao);

                    if (item == "VÍDEOS"){
                        item = "TVGQ";
                    }
                    
                    if(descricao == item) {
                        $(obj).parent().addClass( "main-nav__item--active" );
                    }
                })
            }
        };
</script>

    
        
            
                
                    <script>
                        $(document).ready(function(){
                            MenuSelect.initialize("HOME");
                        });
                    </script>
                
            
        
    

    

    
    

    
        
    
        
    



    
	


    
	
<section class="destaques destaques--12">
    <div class="container">
        
        <div class="materias">
            






<article class="materia-item materia-item--big materia-item--inner  ">
    <a href="http://gq.globo.com/Estilo/Moda-masculina/noticia/2017/03/cinco-dicas-de-visuais-para-fugir-da-chuva-com-estilo-impecavel.html" title="Cinco dicas de visuais para fugir da chuva com estilo impecável">
         
            <figure class="materia-item__thumb bg-cover" style="background-image: url('http://s2.glbimg.com/eSBYlPDxCvXhr_mqGyclON9OeNQ=/467x310/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2017/03/27/visuais.png');"></figure>
            <div class="overlay"></div>
         
    </a>
    <div class="materia-item__float">
        
        <a href="http://gq.globo.com/Estilo/Moda-masculina/noticia/2017/03/cinco-dicas-de-visuais-para-fugir-da-chuva-com-estilo-impecavel.html" title="Cinco dicas de visuais para fugir da chuva com estilo impecável"><h2 class="materia-item__titulo">Cinco dicas de visuais para fugir da chuva com estilo impecável</h2></a>
    </div>
</article>




            






<article class="materia-item materia-item--big materia-item--inner  ">
    <a href="http://gq.globo.com/Prazeres/Poder/noticia/2017/03/estas-sao-10-empresas-com-melhor-reputacao-do-mundo.html" title="Estas são as 10 empresas com a melhor reputação do mundo">
         
            <figure class="materia-item__thumb bg-cover" style="background-image: url('http://s2.glbimg.com/BICC8PnOpUi-xWvGrb2ThE3fuZ8=/467x310/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2015/01/21/6_umaparceriahistorica.jpg');"></figure>
            <div class="overlay"></div>
         
    </a>
    <div class="materia-item__float">
        
        <a href="http://gq.globo.com/Prazeres/Poder/noticia/2017/03/estas-sao-10-empresas-com-melhor-reputacao-do-mundo.html" title="Estas são as 10 empresas com a melhor reputação do mundo"><h2 class="materia-item__titulo">Estas são as 10 empresas com a melhor reputação do mundo</h2></a>

            <p class="materia-item__editoria">Oversized sem errar na medida</p>
        </a>
    </article>
</div>

		$(document).ready(function() {

                    </script></div></div></div></div></section><section class="destaques destaques--listagem destaques--18"><div class="container"><div class="materias"><div class="row"><div <script type="x-tmpl-mustache" id="tpl-destaque-04">
<section class="destaques destaques--listagem destaques--16">
	<div class="container">
		<div class="materias">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="col-lg-8">
					{{#materias}}
					<article class="materia-item {{exhibitionClazzPromoGQ}} {{exhibitionClazzTvGQ}}">
						{{#thumbnail}}
                            {{#thumbnail.300x180}}
                                <a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}"><figure class="materia-item__thumb bg-cover" style="background-image: url({{thumbnail.300x180}});"></figure></a>
                            {{/thumbnail.300x180}}
                        {{/thumbnail}}

						{{^exhibitionClazzPromoGQ}}
                            <a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{editoriaPrincipal}}"><p class="materia-item__editoria">{{editoriaPrincipal}}</p></a>
                        {{/exhibitionClazzPromoGQ}}

                        {{#exhibitionClazzPromoGQ}}
                            <a href="{{permalink}}" title="Promo GQ"><p class="materia-item__editoria">Promo GQ</p></a>
                        {{/exhibitionClazzPromoGQ}}

						<a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}"><h2 class="materia-item__titulo">{{titulo}}</h2></a>
					</article>
					{{/materias}}
				</div>
				{{#sitepage}}
                    <div class="col-lg-4">
                        <div class="banner banner--vertical">
                            <iframe src="/dinamico/get_oas_advertisement/?position=retangulo-1&sitepage={{sitepage}}" width="300px" height="100%" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" onload="resizeIframe(this);bannerContainerIframe(this);"></iframe>
                        </div>
                    </div>
				{{/sitepage}}
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">

        $(document).ready(function() {
            var url_prefix = '/dinamico/breaking_news/gq/widget_uuid/b2b160f1-2eae-4945-b87b-d26b274622eb/94a2467d-43f0-490e-a810-de1b237eb5ae/1490651273'

            
                var url_sufix = '/{{paginaAtual}}/{{qtdPorPaginas}}/?servico=gq2_plantao';
                var url = url_prefix + url_sufix;
            

            var configPaginacao = {
                paginaAtual: 1,
                qtdPorPaginas: 21,
                url: url
            }

            GQMaterias.init(true, configPaginacao);
        });

</script>



    




    

    
        
            <div id="widget-html-5726" class="widget-html ajuste-link-destaque-podio">
    
    <script>
$(".destaques--3 *").on("click", function(event){event.stopImmediatePropagation();})
$(".destaques--3").css({"cursor": "pointer"}).on("click", function(){window.open("http://gq.globo.com/GQ-no-podio/");});
</script>
</div>
        
    





    

    
    

    
    

    
        


<footer class="footer">
	
	    




    

    
        
            
	


    
	
    


    <section class="newsletter newsletter--big" style="background-image: url('http://s2.glbimg.com/odfW0Bd3gD5m1flKBz6rVj-AxOQ=/2560x670/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2016/06/16/news_home_4.jpg');">
        <div class="container" style="background-image:none">
            <figure class="newsletter__logo">
                <img src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/img/logo-gq-newsletter.png">
                <figcaption class="newsletter__logo__caption">RECEBA NOSSA NEWSLETTER</figcaption>
            </figure>
            <form class="newsletter__form" id="newsletter_form">
                <input type="checkbox" id="politica_privacidade" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: -20px;">
                <span class="assinatura__inferior__helper" style="font-size: 15px; position: absolute; left: 22px; bottom: 4px;">Li e concordo com a <a style="color:#000; font-weight: bold;" href="http://www.globo.com/privacidade.html" target="_blank">Política de Privacidade</a></span>
                <input type="email" name="email" id="newsletter_email" class="newsletter__form__campo" placeholder="Favor preencher o seu e-mail">
                <input type="submit" class="newsletter__form__btn" value="Ok">
            </form>
        </div>
        <style type="text/css">
        .newsletter .newsletter__form {
            position: relative;
        }
        </style>
        <script>
            function valida(email) {
                var filtro_mail = /([\w\-]+\@[\w\-]+\.[\w\-]+)/;
                if (!filtro_mail.test(email) || email == "") {
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.border = "1px solid #E32036";
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.color = "#E32036";
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").setAttribute('placeholder', "Favor preencher um e-mail válido!");
                    document.getElementById("newsletter_email").focus();
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            }

            function valida_politica_privacidade(){
                if(!($('#politica_privacidade').is(":checked"))){
                    alert('Para inscrever-se a receber newsletters você deve aceitar a nossa política de privacidade')
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            }

            $('#newsletter_form').submit(function (form) {
                var values = {};
                values['revista'] = '13';
                values['email'] = $('#newsletter_email').val();
                form.preventDefault();
                var valida_email = valida(values['email']);
                if ((valida_email) && (valida_politica_privacidade())){
                    $.post('/dinamico/newsletter/', values)
                            .done(function (data) {
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.border = "1px solid #005b2d";
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").style.color = "#005b2d";
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").value = '';
                                document.getElementById("newsletter_email").setAttribute('placeholder', "E-mail cadastrado com sucesso!");
                            });
                }
                else {
                    return false;
                }
            });
        </script>
    </section>






        
    


	
	    




    

    
        
            
	


    
	
<section class="assinatura">
	<div class="container">
		<div class="assinatura__item">
			

    <a title="Assine Já!" href="http://www.assineglobo.com.br/produtos/gq/GQ/?site_par=1&amp;origem_par=1&amp;formato_par=RODAPE_GQ_MENSAL&amp;versao_par=RODAPE&amp;utm_source=rodape&amp;utm_medium=site&amp;utm_campaign=rodape_gq_mensal&amp;utm_content=rodape:site:rodape_gq_mensal:rodape_gq&amp;utm_term=rodape_gq">
        <figure class="assinatura__thumb assinatura__thumb--revista">
            <img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/x51GIgd-WP77WrwHBgZwVZtnguI=/136x182/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2016/06/06/solano_sem_lombada.jpg">
        </figure>
        <span class="assinatura__helper">Assine Já!</span>
    </a>

		</div>
		<div class="assinatura__item">
			

    <a title="Revista Digital" href="http://gq.globo.com/revista-digital.html">
        <figure class="assinatura__thumb assinatura__thumb--revista-digital">

        </figure>
        <span class="assinatura__helper">Revista Digital</span>
    </a>

		</div>
		<div class="assinatura__item">

<script type="x-tmpl-mustache" id="tpl-menu-materias-relacionadas">
	
		<div class="sub-nav-relacionadas">
			{{#conteudos}}
			<div class="sub-nav-relacionadas__item">
				<a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}">
					<figure class="sub-nav-relacionadas__item__thumb bg-cover" style="background-image: url({{thumbnail}})"></figure>
					<div class="sub-nav-relacionadas__item__wrap">
						<strong class="sub-nav-relacionadas__item__editoria">{{editoria_principal}}</strong>
						<p class="sub-nav-relacionadas__item__txt">{{titulo}}</p>
					</div>
				</a>
			</div>
			{{/conteudos}}
		</div>
	 
</script>
    

    <div id="background"></div>
    <div id="dhtml"></div>



    <script>
  var dadosNavegg = {};

  if (typeof nvg13574 !== "undefined") {

    dadosNavegg.gender = nvg13574.getSegment("gender");
    dadosNavegg.age = nvg13574.getSegment("age");
    dadosNavegg.education = nvg13574.getSegment("education");
    dadosNavegg.marital = nvg13574.getSegment("marital");
    dadosNavegg.income = nvg13574.getSegment("income");
    dadosNavegg.interest = nvg13574.getSegment("interest");
    dadosNavegg.product = nvg13574.getSegment("product");
    dadosNavegg.brand = nvg13574.getSegment("brand");
    dadosNavegg.career = nvg13574.getSegment("career");
    dadosNavegg.country = nvg13574.getSegment("country");
    dadosNavegg.region = nvg13574.getSegment("region");
    dadosNavegg.city = nvg13574.getSegment("city");
    dadosNavegg.cluster = nvg13574.getSegment("cluster");

  }

  function getCookie(name) {
      var value = "; " + document.cookie;
      var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
      if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  }

  function getCADUNID() {

    var cadunId = getCookie('CADUN_ID');
    cadunId = cadunId.replace(/['"]+/g, '');
    
    return cadunId.substring(0, 10);

  }

  function getCookieGADS() {

    var gads = getCookie('__gads');
    return gads.split(':')[0].split('=')[1];

  }


  var globoId = getCADUNID();
  var iddfp = getCookieGADS();
  var idga = getCookie('_ga').match(/\d{2,}.{1}\d{2,}/)[0];

  console.log(globoId, iddfp, idga);

</script>

<script>

  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
  ga('create', 'UA-21942769-1', 'auto', {userId: globoId});
  ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
  ga('set', 'dimension3',globoId);
  ga('set', 'dimension4',iddfp);
  ga('set', 'dimension5',idga);
  ga('set', 'dimension6',dadosNavegg.gender);
  ga('set', 'dimension7',dadosNavegg.age);
  ga('set', 'dimension8',dadosNavegg.education);
  ga('set', 'dimension9',dadosNavegg.marital);
  ga('set', 'dimension10',dadosNavegg.income);
  ga('set', 'dimension11',dadosNavegg.interest);
  ga('set', 'dimension12',dadosNavegg.product);
  ga('set', 'dimension13',dadosNavegg.brand);
  ga('set', 'dimension14',dadosNavegg.career);
  ga('set', 'dimension15',dadosNavegg.country);
  ga('set', 'dimension16',dadosNavegg.region);
  ga('set', 'dimension17',dadosNavegg.city);
  ga('set', 'dimension18',dadosNavegg.cluster);
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>



    






    





    
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/vendor/mustache.js/mustache.min.js"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/_js/scripts.js"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/vendor/moment/min/moment-with-locales.min.js"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/vendor/moment/locale/pt-br.js"></script>
            <script>

                var srcSelo = 'http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/gq2/img/gq-selo-fixo-3.png';

                var resizeIframe = function(obj) {
                    var src = $(obj).attr('src');
                    $(obj).attr("style", "height:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px")
                }

               function bannerContainerIframe(obj) {
                   var placeholder = '<div class="banner banner--vertical"><img src="'+srcSelo+'"></div>';
                   var src = $(obj).attr('src');
                    if($(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight < 600) {
                        $(obj).parents('.banner').parent().append(placeholder);
                    }
               }

               function bannerContainer($element) {

                    var placeholder = '<div class="banner banner--vertical"><img src="'+srcSelo+'"></div>';
                    if(!$element.is(':empty') && $element.height() <= 250) {
                        console.log($element.height());
                        $element.parent().append(placeholder);
                    }
               }

                
                    var urlServicosMenu = "/dinamico/filhas/gq/{{editorias}}/3/1/?servico=thumb_menu";
                
                $(document).ready(function() {
                    RevistaGQ.init(urlServicosMenu);
                });

               function handleBannerOverHighlight($bannerElement, $highlightElement, limitSize) {
                    if(!$bannerElement.is(':empty') && $bannerElement.height() > limitSize) {
                        $bannerElement.show();
                        $highlightElement.remove();
                    }
               }

            </script>


            <script type="text/javascript">
                jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                    if (typeof glb !== 'undefined') {
                        var midiasEmbed = glb.midiasEmbeded;
                        if (midiasEmbed
